title: My Ride is a Bitch / Don't Cross this Line / Never Submit
description: Save that MONEY and buy the FIRST Fan Version Omnibus of books 10 - 12 (Including Release The Dogs of War - Sued For Peace - We Have Contact)I think I am too old to be a groupie, but here I am!!! - Lisa M. author: Michael Anderle
